messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] SWORDSMITHS OF JAPAN: 1926-1945
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Franco, Thanks for your time in reply. I sent this email in error and the book has been located. The request was for SWORDSMITHS OF JAPAN: 1926-1945 (F&G,
messages.messageBody:
Hi Franco,



Thanks for your time in reply.

I sent this email in error and the book has been located. The request was
for SWORDSMITHS OF JAPAN: 1926-1945 (F&G, 1983) which was a 275-page
monograph of collected oshigata. This was on of two books the authors
produced specific to the subject prior to their 1985 THE OSHIGATA BOOK.
Detail of all three monographs are listed here
http://www.satcho.com/PS_References.htm



Again thanks and,





Best regards,





Michael



_____

From: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com [mailto:nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com] On
Behalf Of Franco D
Sent: Wednesday, April 06, 2011 11:49 PM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] SWORDSMITHS OF JAPAN: 1926-1945





http://www.militaria.co.za/nmb/viewtopic.php?p=70378

--- On Tue, 4/5/11, Michael Harris / satcho.com <michael@...
<mailto:michael%40satcho.com> > wrote:

From: Michael Harris / satcho.com <michael@...
<mailto:michael%40satcho.com> >
Subject: [nihontostudy] SWORDSMITHS OF JAPAN: 1926-1945
To:
Date: Tuesday, April 5, 2011, 9:06 PM

Michael

I'm looking for a copy of SWORDSMITHS OF JAPAN: 1926-1945 by Richard Fuller
and Ron Gregory. I know it's difficult to locate but was hoping you could
assist. Please let me know if this is possible and the cost. I see on your
site where you've previously sold this title. I would be paying via PayPal.
Thanks.
